item.title: 消息称苹果已向三星订购千万块折叠屏面板
item.guid: 消息称苹果已向三星订购千万块折叠屏面板
item.description:
According to ET News and MacRumors, Apple has ordered 22 million OLED panels from Samsung Display, which will be used in its first foldable iPhone. 据 ET News 及 MacRumors 报道，苹果已向三星显示（Samsung Display）订购了 2200 万块 OLED 面板，并将用于前者首款折叠屏 iPhone。

The report points out that these 22 million OLED panels include both inner folding screens and outer screens, each accounting for 11 million units. Based on this analysis, considering yield rates and quality inspections, Apple's first foldable iPhone is expected to have a target production of approximately 10 million units. 报道指出，这 2200 万块 OLED 面板包含内折叠屏幕以及外屏，分别均为 1100 万块。据此分析，综合良品率以及质量抽检， 苹果首款折叠屏 iPhone 目标产量将约为 1000 万台。

This production target is about 30% higher than the initial industry expectation (6-8 million units). 而这一生产目标比最初的行业预期（600-800 万台）高出 30% 左右。

Reports re-examine that the foldable iPhone will adopt an inward-folding form, with an external screen size of 5.35 inches and an internal screen of 7.58 inches. Regarding creases, Apple will optimize the foldable screen creases through advanced hinge design and special material properties. 报道重审，折叠屏 iPhone 将采用内折叠形态，外屏尺寸 5.35 寸，内屏为 7.58 寸。折痕方面，苹果将通过先进的设计铰链以及特殊的材料特性，从而优化折叠屏折痕。

According to IDC analysis, the foldable iPhone will drive strong growth in global foldable smartphone shipments in 2026. 另据机构 IDC 分析， 折叠屏 iPhone 将推动 2026 年全球折叠智能手机出货量的强劲增长。

IDC believes that due to the estimated starting price of $2400, the foldable iPhone will capture over 22% of sales share and 34% of the foldable phone market value in its first year of release. IDC 认为，由于预计的 2400 美元起售价，折叠屏 iPhone 在其发布第一年，将占据超过 22% 的销量份额和 34% 的折叠手机市场价值。

The institution predicts that thanks to Apple's entry, the foldable smartphone market is expected to grow by 30% by 2026. 机构预计，得益于苹果入局，可折叠智能手机市场预计将于 2026 年增长 30%。

item.title: 小米中国区人事大调整，王晓雁亲自抓业绩
item.guid: 小米中国区人事大调整，王晓雁亲自抓业绩
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Xiaomi China recently initiated a series of personnel adjustments involving core business segments such as mobile phones, automobiles, and major appliances. The specific arrangements are as follows: 据界面新闻报道，小米中国区近期启动了一系列人事调整，涉及手机、汽车、大家电等核心业务板块。具体安排如下：

    The former General Manager of Sales Operations Department 1 will be concurrently held by Wang Xiaoyan, Senior Vice President and President of Xiaomi China;

    Guo Jinbao, General Manager of Jiangsu Branch, has been promoted to General Manager of Sales Operations Department 2, and will continue to concurrently serve as General Manager of Jiangsu Branch;

    Zhang Jian, former General Manager of Xiaomi Auto Sales and Delivery Service Department, has been transferred to General Manager of New Retail Department, and Xia Zhiguo will take over as General Manager of Auto Sales and Delivery Service Department;

    He Junling has been appointed General Manager of Gansu-Qinghai-Ningxia Branch;

    Liu Yaoping, former General Manager of Sales Operations Department 2, and Sun Hao, General Manager of Sales Operations Department 1, have been transferred from their original positions.

Multiple informed sources revealed that this adjustment is closely related to the slowdown in Xiaomi China's performance. 多位知情人士透露，此次调整与小米中国区业绩放缓密切相关。

Recently, Xiaomi has seen a slowdown in order growth for its mobile phone, automotive, and major appliance businesses. Some dealers have even experienced an accumulation of air conditioner inventory, forcing them to sell at low prices to recover funds. Xiaomi has also consequently slowed down its new retail expansion pace, shifting towards a store optimization strategy. 近期，小米在手机、汽车及大家电业务订单增长出现放缓，部分经销商甚至出现空调库存积压，不得不低价转卖以回笼资金。小米也因此放缓了新零售扩张节奏，转向门店优化策略。

Regarding its retail strategy, Xiaomi Home has clarified that its core objective for 2026 will shift from "scale expansion" to "quality improvement." 在零售战略方面，小米之家明确 2026 年的核心目标将从「规模扩张」转向「质量提升」。

The company plans to centrally close inefficient and loss-making stores opened before January 1, 2025, and will retain a "one store, one discussion" application channel for efficient but loss-making stores. 公司计划集中关闭 2025 年 1 月 1 日前开设的低效且亏损门店，并为高效但亏损的门店保留「一店一议」的申请通道。

Xiaomi expects to proactively bear a one-time loss of approximately 27.26 million yuan to help partners reduce annual losses by over 72.46 million yuan. 小米预计将主动承担一次性损失约 2726 万元，以帮助合作伙伴每年减少超过 7246 万元的亏损。

Industry insiders predict that the number of store closures nationwide is highly likely to exceed 1,000. 业内人士预测，全国范围内关店数量大概率将超过 1000 家。

Some dealers reported that Xiaomi proposed optimizing the staffing structure of car stores, adjusting the original "1 + 2 + 11" model (store manager, supervisor, sales, respectively) to "1 + 1 + 5" to improve human efficiency. Although a store closure channel has been opened, the actual number of stores involved is limited and will not significantly impact overall operations. 部分经销商反馈称，小米提出优化汽车门店人员结构的建议，将原「1 + 2 + 11」（分别为店长、主管、销售）模式调整为「1 + 1 + 5」，以提升人效。尽管开放了关店通道，但实际涉及的门店数量有限，不会对整体运营造成重大影响。

item.title: 努比亚 CEO 倪飞谈「豆包手机」：AI 手机发展势不可逆
item.guid: 努比亚-CEO-倪飞谈「豆包手机」：AI-手机发展势不可逆
item.description:
Yesterday, Ni Fei, CEO of ZTE Nubia, posted a long article on Weibo, responding to public attention regarding the technical preview version of Nubia M153 Doubao Mobile Assistant. 昨天，中兴努比亚 CEO 倪飞在微博发布长文，回应外界对努比亚 M153 豆包手机助手技术预览版的关注。

He emphasized that the development trend of AI phones is irreversible, and Nubia has chosen "openness" as its core strategy, engaging in deep cooperation with Doubao Assistant, aiming to bring users a better product experience. 他强调，AI 手机的发展趋势已不可逆转，努比亚选择以「开放」为核心战略，与豆包助手展开深度合作，旨在为用户带来更优质的产品体验。

Ni Fei pointed out that the mobile phone industry has long lacked disruptive innovation, and in the era of AI transformation, cross-industry integration has become a breakthrough. 倪飞指出， 手机行业长期缺乏颠覆式创新，而在 AI 大变革时代，跨界融合成为突破口。

He cited "Apple + iPhone and ChatGPT" and "Samsung and Gemini" as examples, emphasizing the synergistic effect of 1 + 1 > 2, and stated that this cooperation is based on this concept. 他以「苹果 + iPhone 与 ChatGPT」、「三星与 Gemini」为例，强调 1 + 1 > 2 的协同效应，并表示此次合作正是基于这一理念。

He emphasized that Nubia adheres to the "AI for All" concept, continuously promoting multi-model collaboration and full-scenario deployment, forming nearly a decade of technical accumulation and practice, from the Z series full-screen phones to the latest M153. 他强调，努比亚坚持「AI for All」的理念，持续推进多模型协同、全场景布局，从 Z 系列真全面屏手机到最新的 M153，形成了近十年的技术积累与实践。

Regarding external doubts and feedback, Ni Fei stated that the company is actively communicating with partners to resolve issues and welcomes users to continue following up on future developments. Ni Fei emphasized that Nubia will continue to uphold a pragmatic and sincere attitude, focusing on technological innovation that can truly improve user experience. 针对外界的质疑与反馈，倪飞表示公司正与合作伙伴积极沟通解决问题，并欢迎用户持续关注后续进展。倪飞强调，努比亚将继续秉持务实与真诚的态度，专注于能真正改善用户体验的技术创新。

On the same day, Li Liang, Vice President of ByteDance, reposted the article on Weibo, stating, "The changes brought by AI are real, and user needs are also real. Whether this time is successful or not, AI is definitely the future." 当天，字节跳动副总裁李亮在微博转发了该文章，表示 「AI 带来的变革是真实存在的，用户的需求也是真实存在的，无论这次是不是成功，AI 都一定是未来。」

item.title: 前苹果首席运营官加入迪士尼董事会
item.guid: 前苹果首席运营官加入迪士尼董事会
item.description:
According to MacRumors, former Apple COO Jeff Williams may join Disney's board of directors. 据 MacRumors 报道，前苹果首席运营官 Jeff Williams 或将加入迪士尼董事会。

The report states that Disney's board of directors has nominated Jeff Williams as a new independent director, and he will stand for election at the annual shareholders' meeting in 2026. 报道称， 迪士尼董事会提名 Jeff Williams 担任新的独立董事，并且其将在 2026 年的年度股东大会上参选。

It is reported that Williams served as Apple's Chief Operating Officer from December 2015 to November 2025 and retired from Apple in November 2025. Previously, he was responsible for global operations, customer service/support at Apple. Notably, Williams was also responsible for Apple Watch and Health. 据悉，Williams 自 2015 年 12 月至 2025 年 11 月担任苹果公司首席运营官，并于 2025 年 11 月从苹果公司退休。其此前在苹果负责全球运营、客户服务/支持。值得一提的是，Williams 还负责了 Apple Watch 和健康。

Williams stated in a statement that he looks forward to contributing to Disney's growth. "I am deeply honored to be nominated to the board of directors of this historic company. I look forward to working with Disney's talented leadership team to contribute to the company's continued innovation and excellence." Williams 在一份声明中表示，自己很期待为迪士尼的增长做贡献。「能够被提名为这家历史悠久公司的董事会成员，我感到非常荣幸。我期待与迪士尼才华横溢的领导团队合作，为公司的持续创新和卓越发展做出贡献。」

item.title: 英伟达 H200 芯片获批对华出口，中外方回应
item.guid: 英伟达-H200-芯片获批对华出口，中外方回应
item.description:
According to CCTV News and CNBC, US President Trump confirmed in yesterday's statement that the US will allow Nvidia to export H200 AI chips to "approved customers" in China, on the condition that the US government will collect a 25% share from relevant sales. 据央视新闻和 CNBC 报道，美国总统特朗普在昨天的声明中确认，美国将允许英伟达向中国「获批客户」出口 H200 AI 芯片，但条件是美国政府将从相关销售中收取 25% 的分成。

Trump emphasized that the US Department of Commerce is finalizing specific arrangements, and similar mechanisms will also apply to other AI chip companies, including AMD and Intel. 特朗普强调，美国商务部正在敲定具体安排，类似机制也将适用于其他人工智能芯片公司，包括超微半导体与英特尔。

Meanwhile, Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Guo Jiakun responded at yesterday's regular press conference, stating that China has noted the relevant reports and reiterated that China and the US should achieve mutual benefit and win-win results through cooperation. 与此同时，中国外交部发言人郭嘉昆在昨天举行的例行记者会上回应称，中方注意到相关报道，并重申中美应通过合作实现互利共赢。

Following the announcement, Nvidia's stock price rose by about 2% in after-hours trading, and AMD's stock price also climbed. 消息公布后，英伟达股价在盘后交易中上涨约 2%，AMD 股价也有所攀升。

Previously, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang pointed out that China is one of the world's largest AI markets, with an estimated market size potentially reaching $50 billion in the next two to three years. 此前，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋指出，中国是全球最大的人工智能市场之一，预计未来两到三年市场规模可能达到 500 亿美元。

He emphasized that if American companies miss out on this market, it would be a huge loss, and the US must recognize that it is not the only player in the AI race. 他强调，若美国企业错失这一市场，将是巨大的损失，美国必须认识到在人工智能竞赛中并非唯一参与者。

item.title: 华为成立基础大模型部，AI 战略再升级
item.guid: 华为成立基础大模型部，AI-战略再升级
item.description:
According to reports from "Science and Technology Innovation Board Daily," Huawei's 2012 Laboratories officially established the "Foundation Large Model Department" yesterday, positioning it as a core institution to advance the development of foundational models. This move is seen as a significant upgrade in Huawei's AI strategy, aiming to accelerate the research, development, and implementation of large model technologies. 据《科创板日报》消息，华为 2012 实验室已于昨天正式成立「基础大模型部」，定位为推进基座模型开发的核心机构。这一举措被视为华为在人工智能战略上的重要升级，旨在加速大模型技术的研发与落地。

Public information shows that Huawei had previously issued a global AI talent recruitment order, explicitly stating a preference for candidates with original scientific research achievements. 公开信息显示，此前华为已面向全球发布 AI 人才招募令，明确提出优先考虑具备原创性科研成果的候选人。

Recruitment requirements include an excellent academic background, innovative spirit, and outstanding achievements in top international competitions or research fields. 招聘要求包括卓越的学术背景、创新精神以及在国际顶级竞赛或科研领域的突出成绩。

Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG, also publicly stated that Huawei's goal is to "build the world's strongest AI," emphasizing that the company will provide new employees with ample computing resources and opportunities to work with top scientists. 华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东也曾公开表示，华为的目标是「打造世界最强 AI」，并强调公司将为入职者提供充足算力资源及与顶尖科学家共事的机会。

As Huawei's technology research and innovation center, 2012 Laboratories' business covers multiple ICT fields, including future networks, artificial intelligence, computing clusters, chips, operating systems, databases, media technology, security, and precision manufacturing. 2012 实验室作为华为的技术研究与创新中心，业务涵盖未来网络、人工智能、计算集群、芯片、操作系统、数据库、媒体技术、安全及精密制造等多个 ICT 领域。

item.title: 「交管 12123」App 鸿蒙版核心功能完成开发
item.guid: 「交管-12123」App-鸿蒙版核心功能完成开发
item.description:
Yesterday, the HarmonyOS version of the "Traffic Management 12123" App officially pushed the 3.4.2 update, with core feature development completed. The new version fully integrates the business center functions, adds the "Vehicle Plate Selection for In-Use Vehicles" service, and fixes known issues. 昨天，「交管 12123」App 鸿蒙版正式推送 3.4.2 版本更新，核心功能开发已完成。新版本实现业务中心功能全面拉通，同时新增「在用车选号」业务，并修复已知问题。

The 'Traffic Management 12123' App launched its HarmonyOS native version on March 19 this year, with the first batch of service functions covering nearly 60% of traffic management services. 「交管 12123」App 于今年 3 月 19 日上线鸿蒙原生版本，首批服务功能覆盖近 60% 的交管业务。

Data released by the Ministry of Public Security News Media Center on September 30 shows that the 'Traffic Management 12123' App has accumulated over 590 million registered users, with an average daily visit volume of approximately 27 million people and an average daily business service volume exceeding 4 million transactions. 公安部新闻传媒中心在 9 月 30 日公布数据显示，「交管 12123」App 累计注册用户已超过 5.9 亿，日均访问量约 2700 万人次，日均办理业务服务超过 400 万笔。

item.title: 阿里巴巴成立千问 C 端事业群，瞄准 AI 超级 APP
item.guid: 阿里巴巴成立千问-C-端事业群，瞄准-AI-超级-APP
item.description:
According to multiple media reports, Alibaba Group announced yesterday the establishment of the 'Qianwen C-end Business Group,' led by Group Vice President Wu Jia. 据多家媒体报道，阿里巴巴集团已于昨天宣布成立「千问 C 端事业群」，由集团副总裁吴嘉负责。

This business group was formed by the merger and reorganization of the original Smart Information and Smart Interconnection business groups, integrating multiple businesses such as Qianwen APP, Quark, AI hardware, UC, and Shuqi. 该事业群由原智能信息与智能互联两个事业群合并重组而来，整合了千问 APP、夸克、AI 硬件、UC、书旗等多项业务。

The newly established Qianwen C-end Business Group is positioned as Alibaba's strategic core in the AI era, with its primary goal being to build Qianwen into a 'super APP,' becoming the first entry point for users into the AI world. 新成立的千问 C 端事业群被定位为阿里巴巴在 AI 时代的战略核心，其首要目标是将千问打造为「超级 APP」，成为用户进入 AI 世界的第一入口。

According to Cailian Press, Alibaba emphasized in internal communications that Qianwen will further develop into an ubiquitous AI assistant in the future, covering various scenarios such as glasses, PCs, and cars, allowing ordinary users to use AI anytime, anywhere and continuously benefit. 据财联社消息，阿里巴巴在内部沟通中强调，未来千问将进一步发展为无处不在的 AI 助手，覆盖眼镜、PC、汽车等多种场景，让普通用户能够随时随地使用 AI 并持续受益。

Over the past month, Qianwen has performed remarkably in the C-end market: the APP's public beta download volume exceeded 10 million in one week, and both user growth and retention surpassed expectations. 过去一个月，千问在 C 端市场表现亮眼：APP 公测一周下载量突破 1000 万，用户增长与留存均超预期。

At the same time, Qianwen has deeply integrated with products such as Quark AI Browser and Quark AI Glasses, rapidly entering more application scenarios. Last week, Qianwen achieved a 'triple release,' continuously iterating on core capabilities such as creation, learning, and office work. 同时，千问已与夸克 AI 浏览器、夸克 AI 眼镜等产品深度融合，快速进入更多应用场景。上周，千问实现「三连发」，在创作、学习、办公等核心能力上持续迭代。

Alibaba's core management team views 'Qianwen' as the 'future battle in the AI era,' planning to integrate various life scenarios such as maps, food delivery, ticket booking, office work, learning, shopping, and health into Qianwen, endowing it with powerful 'task-handling' capabilities. 阿里巴巴核心管理层将「千问」视为「AI 时代的未来之战」，计划将地图、外卖、订票、办公、学习、购物、健康等多类生活场景接入千问，赋予其强大的「办事」能力。

item.title: Google 否认 Gemini 将引入广告
item.guid: Google-否认-Gemini-将引入广告
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google has denied reports about its plans to introduce ads in Gemini. 据 Android Authority 报道，Google 否认了有关其计划在 Gemini 中引入广告的消息。

Dan Taylor, Google's Global Vice President of Ads, explicitly stated on social platform X that there are no ads in the Gemini app, and the company 'has no plans to change this status quo.' He emphasized that external rumors about ads coming to Gemini are not true. Google 全球广告副总裁 Dan Taylor 在社交平台 X 上明确指出，Gemini 应用中没有广告，公司也「没有任何改变这一现状的计划」。他强调，外界关于广告即将进入 Gemini 的传言并不属实。

Previously, some media claimed that Google was in talks with advertisers, with related ad features expected to launch as early as 2026. However, Google stated that it currently has no such plans, and the reports are 'based on uninformed anonymous sources and contain inaccuracies.' 此前有媒体称，Google 正与广告客户进行洽谈，预计最早在 2026 年推出相关广告功能。然而，Google 表示目前并无此类计划，相关报道「基于不知情的匿名消息源，存在不准确的说法」。

It's worth noting that advertising revenue has always been Google's core business. Although the company currently denies introducing ads in Gemini, it has not completely ruled out future possibilities. 值得注意的是，广告收入一直是 Google 的核心业务。尽管公司目前否认在 Gemini 中引入广告，但并未完全排除未来的可能性。

Meanwhile, competitor ChatGPT has also been reported to be exploring advertising models, with relevant code snippets showing that it may support 'search ads' and 'ad features' in the future. 与此同时，竞争对手 ChatGPT 也被曝正在探索广告模式，相关代码片段显示其可能在未来支持「搜索广告」和「广告功能」等内容。

Additionally, Google has tested ads in the AI mode of search, displaying sponsored results alongside AI-generated answers. This move indicates the company's willingness to experiment with ads in AI products, but Gemini currently remains ad-free. 此外，Google 已在搜索的 AI 模式中测试广告，将赞助结果与 AI 生成的答案并列展示。这一举措显示公司在 AI 产品中尝试广告的意愿，但 Gemini 目前仍保持无广告状态。

item.title: 美国初创平台申请接管「Twitter」商标：马斯克已放弃
item.guid: 美国初创平台申请接管「Twitter」商标：马斯克已放弃
item.description:
According to Reuters, US startup social platform Operation Bluebird has filed an application with the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) to cancel 'Twitter' related trademarks, in order to use identifiers such as 'Twitter' and 'tweet' on its new platform 'twitter.new'. 据路透社报道，美国初创社交平台 Operation Bluebird 已向美国专利商标局（USPTO）提交申请，要求撤销「Twitter」相关商标，以便在其新平台「twitter.new」上使用「Twitter」和「tweet」等标识。

The company claims that Elon Musk's X Corp has abandoned these trademarks at both legal and commercial levels. 该公司声称，埃隆・马斯克旗下的 X 公司已在法律和商业层面放弃了这些商标。

Operation Bluebird, headquartered in Virginia, submitted the application on December 2, completed by the company's General Counsel Stephen Coates. Operation Bluebird 总部位于弗吉尼亚州，申请于 12 月 2 日提交，由该公司总法律顾问斯蒂芬・科茨（Stephen Coates）代表完成。

Coates, formerly a trademark lawyer for Twitter, stated in a declaration: 'X Corp has legally abandoned the 'Twitter' trademark.' 科茨曾是 Twitter 的商标律师，他在声明中表示：「X 公司已依法放弃了『Twitter』商标。」

He emphasized that the X platform has completely removed the Twitter brand, including the iconic blue bird logo, and migrated the domain from twitter.com to x.com. 他强调，X 平台已彻底清除 Twitter 品牌，包括标志性的蓝色小鸟 Logo，并将域名从 twitter.com 迁移至 x.com。

Musk publicly stated in 2023 that the company would "bid farewell to the Twitter brand and gradually abandon all bird elements." However, X Corp's application for Twitter trademark renewal, submitted in 2023, was still approved, making the issue of trademark ownership more complex. 马斯克在 2023 年曾公开表示，公司将「告别 Twitter 品牌，并逐步弃用所有鸟类元素」。不过，X 公司在 2023 年提交的 Twitter 商标续展申请仍获批，这使得商标归属问题更具复杂性。

Intellectual property lawyer Josh Gerben pointed out that if X Corp indeed no longer uses these trademarks, it will face obstacles in defending its trademark ownership. 知识产权律师乔什・格本（Josh Gerben）指出，如果 X 公司确实不再使用这些商标，其在捍卫商标所有权方面将面临障碍。

But even if the trademarks are revoked, X Corp may still try to prevent Operation Bluebird from commercially using the "Twitter" name. He believes this challenge is "an interesting test" of whether X Corp will continue to protect abandoned brands. 但即便商标被撤销，X 公司仍可能试图阻止 Operation Bluebird 在商业上使用「Twitter」名称。他认为，这一挑战是对 X 公司是否会继续保护已弃用品牌的「一次有趣的测试」。

item.title: Google 正与苹果合作优化换机体验
item.guid: Google-正与苹果合作优化换机体验
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google and Apple are collaborating to develop a new data transfer method to address the long-standing pain points users face when switching between Android and iPhone. 据 Android Authority 报道，Google 与苹果正在合作开发全新的数据传输方式，以解决用户在 Android 与 iPhone 之间切换时长期存在的痛点。

Currently, users primarily rely on Google's "Android Switch" App or Apple's "Move to iOS" App for migration, but the process often comes with issues such as incomplete data, lost photos or messages, poor app compatibility, iMessage and SMS not transferring properly, and slow transfer speeds. This collaboration is seen as a significant improvement in user experience for both major ecosystems. 目前，用户主要依赖 Google 的「Android Swith」App 或苹果的「转移到 iOS」App 进行迁移，但过程常伴随数据不完整、照片或信息丢失、应用兼容性不佳、iMessage 与短信无法正常传输以及传输速度缓慢等问题。此次合作被视为两大生态系统在用户体验上的重要改进。

The report states that a new "Copy Data" option has appeared in the latest Android Canary version. 报道称，在最新的 Android Canary 版本中，已出现全新的「复制数据」选项。

This feature is located in the "Settings > Profile > All Services > Pair with iPhone or iPad" menu, adding a wireless data transfer method in addition to the existing eSIM transfer. 该功能位于「设置 > 个人资料 > 所有服务 > 与 iPhone 或 iPad 配对」菜单中，除现有的 eSIM 传输外，新增了无线数据传输方式。

Notably, users need to enter a session ID and password to complete device pairing, and the target iPhone must be running iOS 26 to use it. 值得注意的是，用户需输入会话 ID 与密码以完成设备间的配对，且目标 iPhone 必须运行 iOS 26 才能使用。

Furthermore, during the initial device setup process, this option will also appear when users select "Copy data using Android Switch" and specify an iPhone or iPad as the recovery source. 此外，在设备初始设置过程中，当用户选择「使用 Android Switch 复制数据」并指定恢复来源为 iPhone 或 iPad 时，也会出现该选项。

Currently, the feature is still under development and is expected to first launch in future iOS 26 developer beta and Android Beta versions, before gradually rolling out to official releases. 目前，该功能仍在开发阶段，预计将首先在未来的 iOS 26 开发者测试版与 Android Beta 中上线，随后逐步推送至正式版本。

item.title: 微软小冰创始人李笛再创业，押注认知大模型
item.guid: 微软小冰创始人李笛再创业，押注认知大模型
item.description:
According to NetEase Tech, Li Di, the founder of Microsoft Xiaoice, recently appeared in a new capacity at the 2025 Winter "MiraclePlus Demo Day," announcing the establishment of a new company, "Nextie." This marks his first appearance as an entrepreneur since leaving Xiaoice in April this year. 据网易科技报道，日前在 2025 冬季「奇绩创坛路演日」上，微软小冰创始人李笛以新身份亮相，宣布成立新公司「明日新程」（Nextie）。这是他在今年 4 月离开小冰后首次以创业者身份出现。

Li Di stated that "Nextie" is positioned in collective intelligence and cognitive large models, aiming to address the cognitive deficiencies of existing artificial intelligence. 李笛表示，「明日新程」定位于群体智能与认知大模型，旨在解决现有人工智能在认知上的缺陷。

He emphasized that cognition, not knowledge, is the core of large models, and too much knowledge can actually hinder a model's cognitive abilities. The team has compiled all human papers from 1800 to 2020, forming a 220-year history of collective intelligence evolution, providing a reference for technology development. 他强调，认知而非知识才是大模型的核心，过多的知识反而会拖累模型的认知能力。团队已整理 1800—2020 年所有人类论文，形成 220 年群体智能演化史，为技术构建提供参考。

The new company's core members include Zeng Min, co-founder of Xiaoice and former Microsoft Chief R&D Director, and Wang Wenlan, head of Xiaoice's large models and algorithms and former Intel architect. 新公司核心成员包括小冰联合创始人、前微软首席研发总监曾敏，以及小冰大模型与算法负责人、前英特尔架构师王文斓。

Currently, the team consists of about 30 people, mainly former core members of Xiaoice. Li Di revealed that the team has completed internal testing of the foundational technology and is expected to officially launch on January 7, 2026. 目前团队规模约 30 人，主要由原小冰核心成员组成。李笛透露，团队已完成基础技术内测，预计将在 2026 年 1 月 7 日正式上线。

Regarding financing, "MiraclePlus" has already invested, and the company plans to launch its next round of multi-million dollar financing. 在融资方面，「奇绩」已参与投资，公司计划启动下一轮千万美元融资。

Li Di pointed out that in the future, a token-based billing model will not be adopted; instead, pricing will be based on the value of deliverables. He prefers the To C market, but the product can also cover To B and To G. 李笛指出，未来不会采用按 token 计费模式，而是根据交付物价值定价。 他更倾向于 To C 市场，但产品也可覆盖 To B 与 To G。

Li Di believes that the current landscape of the AI industry is not yet settled, with neither successful To C products nor clear To B business models. 李笛认为，当前 AI 行业格局尚未确定，既没有成功的 To C 产品，也没有明确的 To B 商业模式。

He pointed out that existing intelligent agents have cognitive deficiencies, excelling at solving problems but not at thinking and executing, a problem that urgently needs to be addressed. At the same time, he admitted that there is a bubble in the industry, but the key lies in whether it can achieve a "soft landing" and transform into a real economy. 他指出，现有智能体存在认知缺陷，擅长做题但不擅长思考与执行，这一问题亟待解决。同时，他坦言行业存在泡沫，但关键在于能否实现「软着陆」，转化为实体经济。

item.title: Reddit 推出未成年人保护措施，澳大利亚社媒禁令明日生效
item.guid: Reddit-推出未成年人保护措施，澳大利亚社媒禁令明日生效
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, social platform Reddit is rolling out new safety features globally for users under 18, including stricter chat settings and personalized ad restrictions. 据彭博社报道，社交平台 Reddit 正在全球范围内为未满 18 岁用户推出新的安全功能，包括更严格的聊天设置和个性化广告限制。

It is worth noting that this move comes as Australia is about to implement a social media ban for minors. 值得注意的是，此举正值澳大利亚即将实施社交媒体未成年人禁令之际。

Under the new regulations, starting this Wednesday local time, Australia will ban users under 16 from popular platforms such as TikTok and Instagram, with violators potentially facing fines of up to A$49.5 million (approximately RMB 230 million). 根据新规，从当地时间周三起，澳大利亚将禁止 16 岁以下用户使用 TikTok、Instagram 等热门平台，违规者可能面临最高 4950 万澳元（约 2.3 亿元人民币）的罚款。

Reddit stated that the new feature will be automatically applied to accounts identified by the system as underage users. Meanwhile, Australian users will need to provide their date of birth upon registration and undergo verification by an age prediction model. Reddit 表示，新功能将自动应用于被系统识别为未成年用户的账户。与此同时，澳大利亚用户在注册时需提供出生日期，并接受年龄预测模型的验证。

In addition to Reddit, companies such as Meta, ByteDance's TikTok, and Snap will also comply with the relevant laws. 除 Reddit 外，Meta、字节跳动旗下 TikTok、Snap 等公司也将遵守相关法律。

It is worth noting that Reddit has challenged some of the requirements, stating that the law's application to its platform is 'arbitrary' and 'legally flawed,' emphasizing that most of its users are adults. 值得注意的是，Reddit 对部分要求提出质疑，称法律对其平台的适用「武断」且「法律上存在错误」，强调其大多数用户为成年人。

However, before the ban is fully implemented, Australian users have already started turning to unaffected platforms. For example, Xiaohongshu saw a 37% year-on-year increase in active users during the week of December 1st, and the usage of US startup platform Coverstar in Australia surged by 488%. 然而，禁令尚未全面实施，澳大利亚用户已开始转向未受影响的平台。例如，小红书在 12 月 1 日当周的活跃用户同比增长 37%，美国初创平台 Coverstar 在澳大利亚的使用量更是激增 488%。

item.title: 💡「大空头」伯里再唱衰：OpenAI 注定失败
item.guid: 💡「大空头」伯里再唱衰：OpenAI-注定失败
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Michael Burry, the real-life inspiration for the movie 'The Big Short,' recently launched a column on the creative platform Substack and posted continuously on the social platform X, reiterating his pessimistic assessment of the current AI boom. 据《商业内幕》报道，电影《大空头》原型人物迈克尔・伯里 (Michael Burry) 近日在创作平台 Substack 上开设专栏，并在社交平台 X 上连续发文，重申其对当前 AI 热潮的悲观判断。

He bluntly stated that OpenAI 'is the next Netscape, destined to fail, and it's burning through a lot of cash.' 他直言，OpenAI「就是下一个网景，注定失败，它正在大量烧钱」。

Burry made the above comments last Friday evening in response to a post by Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff regarding large language models. 伯里在上周五晚间回应 Salesforce CEO 马克・贝尼奥夫 (Marc Benioff) 关于大语言模型的帖子时作出上述评论。

He pointed out that Microsoft is working to sustain OpenAI's operations while keeping it off its balance sheet and absorbing its intellectual property. He questioned why OpenAI continues to receive funding and emphasized that 'the entire industry needs a $500 billion IPO.' 他指出，微软正在努力维持 OpenAI 的运营，同时将其保持在资产负债表之外，并吸收其知识产权。他质疑为何 OpenAI 能持续获得融资，并强调「整个行业需要一场 5000 亿美元的 IPO」。

In another post the following day, Burry added that even if OpenAI raised $60 billion, it would be 'far from enough' to meet its cash needs. 在随后一天的另一条帖子中，伯里补充称，即便 OpenAI 筹集 600 亿美元资金，也「远远不足以」满足其现金需求。

He compared OpenAI to Netscape in the mid-1990s, suggesting it might repeat the mistakes of the dot-com bubble era. Netscape was once the most widely used browser globally and one of the most valuable internet companies at the time, but ultimately became a classic example of rise and fall. 他将 OpenAI 与上世纪 90 年代中期的网景相提并论，认为其可能重蹈互联网泡沫时代的覆辙。网景曾是全球最广泛使用的浏览器，也是当时最具价值的互联网公司之一，但最终成为盛极而衰的典型案例。

Furthermore, Burry recently criticized Nvidia. Last month, he disclosed a short position and accused Nvidia of hoarding GPUs globally. 此外，伯里近期还对英伟达提出批评。他在上月披露了做空仓位，并指责英伟达在全球范围内囤积 GPU。

item.title: 智谱开源 AutoGLM：每台手机都能成为「AI 手机」
item.guid: 智谱开源-AutoGLM：每台手机都能成为「AI-手机」
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhipu AI announced the official open-sourcing of the AutoGLM project, aiming to promote 'AI Agents that can use mobile phones' as a common industry foundation. 昨天，智谱 AI 宣布正式开源 AutoGLM 项目，旨在推动「会用手机的 AI Agent」成为行业公共底座。

    First Complete Link Operation : On October 25, 2024, AutoGLM achieved a stable and complete operational link on a real device, making it the world's first AI Agent with Phone Use capability.

    Cloud Phone and Security Design : In 2025, AutoGLM 2.0 will be launched, utilizing MobileRL, ComputerRL, and AgentRL algorithms for reinforcement learning across thousands of virtual devices, and isolating sensitive data via cloud phones to ensure security and compliance.

Zhipu emphasized that the purpose of open-sourcing is to make AI phone capabilities a shared industry resource, preventing monopolization by a few manufacturers. Furthermore, open-sourcing also means that privacy and control return to the user, allowing enterprises and developers to deploy in their own environments, ensuring data security. 智谱强调，开源的目的在于让 AI 手机能力成为行业共享资源，避免被少数厂商垄断。此外，开源也意味着隐私与控制权回归使用方，企业与开发者可在自身环境中部署，确保数据安全。

Zhipu pointed out that AutoGLM is not the final answer, and the future AI phone ecosystem still holds broader possibilities. The team will continue to advance Agent technology, hoping to achieve 'Jarvis for everyone' within the next decade. 智谱指出，AutoGLM 并非最终答案，未来 AI 手机生态仍有更广阔的可能性。团队将持续推动 Agent 技术发展，期望在未来十年实现「人人身边的贾维斯」。

item.title: 摩尔线程官宣即将发布新一代 GPU 架构
item.guid: 摩尔线程官宣即将发布新一代-GPU-架构
item.description:
Yesterday, Moore Threads announced that its first MUSA Developer Conference (MUSA Developer Conference, referred to as MDC 2025) will open on December 19th at the Zhongguancun International Innovation Center in Beijing, lasting two days, and will unveil a new generation of GPU architecture at the conference. 昨天，摩尔线程宣布其首届 MUSA 开发者大会（MUSA Developer Conference，简称 MDC 2025）将于 12 月 19 日在北京中关村国际创新中心开幕，为期两天，并将在会上 重磅发布新一代 GPU 架构 。

The official statement indicates that as the first developer event in China focusing on full-featured GPUs, this conference is centered on the core concepts of "creation, connection, and convergence," aiming to promote breakthroughs in domestic intelligent computing power and industrial upgrading. 官方表示，作为国内首个聚焦全功能 GPU 的开发者盛会，本次大会以「创造、链接、汇聚」为核心理念，旨在推动国产智能算力的突破与产业升级。

The conference will feature over 20 technical sub-forums, with topics covering key areas such as intelligent computing, graphics computing, scientific computing, AI infrastructure, edge AI, embodied AI, and developer tools and platforms, promoting the deep integration of cutting-edge technology and industrial practice. 大会将设超过 20 场技术分论坛，议题覆盖智能计算、图形计算、科学计算、AI 基础设施、端侧智能、具身智能及开发者工具与平台等关键领域，推动前沿技术与产业实践的深度融合。

At the same time, Moore Threads will also collaborate with ecosystem partners to create an immersive "MUSA Carnival" spanning over 1000㎡, showcasing cutting-edge technologies such as AI large models, embodied AI, and spatial AI, and extending to application scenarios like industrial intelligent manufacturing, digital twins, digital entertainment, and smart healthcare. 同时，摩尔线程还将联合生态伙伴打造超过 1000㎡ 的沉浸式「MUSA 嘉年华」，现场展示 AI 大模型、具身智能、空间智能等前沿技术，并延伸至工业智造、数字孪生、数字文娱与智慧医疗等应用场景。

item.title: 鸿蒙智行首款旗舰 MPV 官宣：命名「智界 V9」
item.guid: 鸿蒙智行首款旗舰-MPV-官宣：命名「智界-V9」
item.description:
Yesterday, during the Hongmeng Zhixing CCTV News program "Extraordinary Step," Hongmeng Zhixing's first MPV was officially announced. 昨天，在鸿蒙智行央视新闻《超凡一步》节目中，鸿蒙智行旗下首款 MPV 正式官宣。

Unlike the previously rumored "Zhijie X9," the new car is officially named "Zhijie V9" and is expected to debut in the spring of next year. 与此前传闻的「智界 X9」不同，新车官方命名为「智界 V9」，预计将于明年春季首发。

According to previous official warm-ups, this flagship model is based on Huawei's DriveONE 800V silicon carbide golden power platform, equipped with 192-line lidar and Huawei's Whale Battery, positioned as Hongmeng Zhixing's "9 Series" flagship MPV. 据官方此前预热，这款旗舰车型基于华为 DriveONE 800V 碳化硅黄金动力平台，配备 192 线激光雷达与华为巨鲸电池，定位为鸿蒙智行「9 系」旗舰 MPV。

Online leaked images show that the car continues the Hongmeng Zhixing family-style front face design and achieves higher adaptability in terms of smart cockpit and intelligent driving systems. 网传图片显示，该车延续鸿蒙智行家族式前脸设计，并在智能座舱与智驾系统方面实现更高适配度。

Richard Yu, Executive Director of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. and Chairman of the Terminal BG, also stated on Weibo that the naming of Zhijie V9 signifies "Victory" and its flagship positioning "9," emphasizing its high-end market strategy. 华为技术有限公司常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东也在微博表示，智界 V9 的命名寓意为「Victory」与旗舰定位的「9」，强调其高端市场战略。

item.title: 群核发布 Aholo 空间智能开放平台，推动 AI 三维应用落地
item.guid: 群核发布-Aholo-空间智能开放平台，推动-AI-三维应用落地
item.description:
Yesterday, at the "2025 Cool+ Conference" held in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, Chen Hang, co-founder and CEO of Quannuclear Technology, delivered a keynote speech and announced the systematic opening of its underlying spatial intelligence capabilities, aiming to accelerate the implementation of this technology across various industries. 昨天，在浙江杭州举行的「2025 酷+大会」上，群核科技联合创始人兼 CEO 陈航发表主题演讲，并宣布系统性开放其底层空间智能能力，旨在推动该技术在千行百业的加速落地。

Quannuclear Technology's strategy is to provide implementable spatial intelligence capabilities, not only achieving high-fidelity visualization but also outputting structured spatial data. Under the realistic conditions of limited computing power, the company more efficiently connects the physical and digital worlds through a diverse combination of technologies such as generation and simulation. 群核科技的战略是提供可落地的空间智能能力，不仅实现高保真可视化，还能输出结构化空间数据。在算力受限的现实条件下，公司通过生成、仿真等多元技术组合，更高效连接物理世界与数字世界。

At the conference, Quannuclear officially released the Aholo Spatial Intelligence Open Platform, allowing developers to build holographic 3D spatial applications by calling capabilities such as reconstruction, generation, editing, and understanding via API/SDK. 在大会上，群核正式发布 Aholo 空间智能开放平台，开发者可通过 API/SDK 调用重建、生成、编辑与理解等能力，构建全息 3D 空间应用。

The platform is currently open for internal testing, and Quannuclear emphasizes that its goal is to promote spatial intelligence technology to empower various industries such as home furnishing, film and television, advertising, gaming, and robotics. 平台目前已开放内测，群核强调其目标是推动空间智能技术赋能家居、影视、广告、游戏、机器人等多个行业。

In addition, Quannuclear also showcased several productized achievements, which have been implemented and applied in areas such as home furnishing, industrial manufacturing, and robot training: 此外，群核还展示了多项产品化成果，这些产品已在家居、工业制造和机器人训练等领域落地应用：

    Kujiale AI Smart Design Platform

    Industrial AI Digital Twin Platform SpatialTwin

    Spatial Intelligence Training Platform SpatialVerse

    3D AI Content Creation Tool LuxReal

Chen Hang stated that Quannuclear Technology hopes to become the 'water seller' in the era of spatial intelligence, building the future with industry partners through an open ecosystem, and promoting the realization of commercial value of spatial intelligence across various industries. 陈航表示，群核科技希望成为空间智能时代的「卖水人」，通过开放生态与行业伙伴共建未来，推动空间智能在千行百业的商业化价值实现。

item.title: 蚂蚁灵光网页版正式上线
item.guid: 蚂蚁灵光网页版正式上线
item.description:
Yesterday, Ant Group announced that its full-modal general AI assistant 'Lingguang' officially launched its web version, further improving its multi-terminal ecosystem layout. Users can directly access it via a browser and experience the core functions 'Lingguang Chat' and 'Lingguang Flash App' on their computers. 昨天，蚂蚁集团宣布旗下全模态通用 AI 助手「灵光」正式上线网页版，进一步完善其多端生态布局。用户可通过浏览器直接访问，在电脑端体验核心功能「灵光对话」与「灵光闪应用」。

The Lingguang web version continues the core advantage of 'generating small applications with natural language in 30 seconds' and achieves data and creation synchronization with the mobile end. Users can describe their needs on the computer, quickly generate, edit, and manage conversations and flash applications, and continue to use and share them on their mobile phones. 灵光网页版延续了「30 秒用自然语言生成小应用」的核心优势，并实现与移动端的数据与创作同步。用户可在电脑端描述需求，快速生成、编辑并管理对话与闪应用，并在手机端继续使用和分享。

item.title: 星巴克 × 哈利 · 波特联名活动全国上线
item.guid: 星巴克-×-哈利-·-波特联名活动全国上线
item.description:
Yesterday, Starbucks announced that its collaboration with Harry Potter officially launched in stores nationwide, creating a strong festive atmosphere for customers with magic-themed drinks, merchandise, and immersive store experiences. 昨天，星巴克宣布与哈利 · 波特的联名活动在全国门店正式上线，借助魔法主题饮品、周边与沉浸式门店场景，为顾客营造浓厚的节日氛围。

This collaboration, themed 'Magic Celebration,' introduces three limited-edition drinks, all inspired by Harry Potter storylines, combining cheese milk, jam, and coffee to present a unique flavor experience: 本次合作以「魔法庆典」为主题，推出三款限定饮品，饮品灵感均源自哈利 · 波特故事情节，结合芝士牛乳、果酱与咖啡，呈现独特风味体验：

    Caramel Crunch Latte

    Berry Raspberry Latte

When consumers purchase new items from the collaboration series, they have the chance to receive limited merchandise such as wand ornaments, badges (starting December 16), or stickers (starting December 23). Magic Academy cup sleeves and limited paper bags are also available. 消费者在购买联名系列新品时，有机会获赠魔杖摆件、徽章（12 月 16 日起）或贴纸（12 月 23 日起）等限定周边，魔法学院杯套及限定纸袋也已上线。

Additionally, until the 29th of this month, Starbucks has also opened Harry Potter themed stores in nearly 40 locations across 27 cities nationwide for consumers to experience and check in. 此外，至本月 29 日，星巴克还在全国 27 座城市的近 40 家门店开启哈利 · 波特主题店，供消费者体验打卡。

item.title: 山姆麻薯盒惊现活老鼠，官方回应：已启动调查
item.guid: 山姆麻薯盒惊现活老鼠，官方回应：已启动调查
item.description:
According to reports from China News Service and Xin Huanghe, in the early hours of yesterday, a consumer in Shenzhen claimed to have found a live mouse in a mochi box purchased through Sam's Club's 'Express Delivery' service, and posted related images on social media, attracting widespread attention. 据中新网和新黄河报道，昨日凌晨，深圳一名消费者称，其在使用山姆会员商店「极速达」购买的麻薯盒中发现有活老鼠，并在社交平台发布相关图片，引发广泛关注。

The images show traces of a mouse in a box of mochi, with some mochi surfaces having noticeable indentations. 图片显示，一盒麻薯中出现老鼠踪迹，部分麻薯表面存在明显凹陷。

In response, Sam's Club stated that it immediately coordinated with a professional pest control company to conduct a full-chain investigation. After reviewing the product manufacturing, packaging, warehouse shelving, and picking processes, no traces of pests or abnormalities were found. 对此，山姆方面回应称，已第一时间联动专业虫害公司开展全链路排查，经回溯商品制作、包装、仓库上架及拣货环节，均未发现虫害痕迹或异常。

Sam's Club stated that the pickup location for the order address is outdoors. Third-party pest control technicians found during on-site inspection that surrounding flower beds and bushes provide habitat for wild pests, and confirmed the presence of related activity traces. Based on the comprehensive investigation results, it is initially judged that the product was accidentally invaded by pests while being placed at the pickup point. 山姆称，该订单地址的取货点位于室外，第三方虫害技术人员在取货点现场勘察时发现，周边花木丛为野生虫害提供栖息条件，并确认存在相关活动痕迹。 综合调查结果，初步判断商品在取货点放置期间遭遇虫害偶然侵入。

Currently, Sam's Club has communicated with the consumer and properly resolved the matter. Moving forward, it will strengthen packaging management and protective measures during the delivery process to reduce similar risks. 目前，山姆已与消费者沟通并妥善解决此事，后续将加强包装管理与配送环节的防护措施，以降低类似风险。

Sam's Club is part of the Walmart Group and has opened over 50 stores nationwide since entering the Chinese market in 1996. 山姆会员商店隶属于沃尔玛集团，自 1996 年进入中国市场以来已在全国开设超过 50 家门店。

item.title: 明年起我国将全面禁产水银体温计
item.guid: 明年起我国将全面禁产水银体温计
item.description:
Cailian Press reported, citing a previous notice from the National Medical Products Administration, that starting from January 1, 2026, China will completely prohibit the production of mercury-containing thermometers and mercury-containing sphygmomanometers. This policy means that mercury thermometers will officially exit the historical stage. 财联社援引国家药监局此前发布的通知报道称，自 2026 年 1 月 1 日起，我国将全面禁止生产含汞体温计和含汞血压计产品。这一政策意味着水银体温计将正式退出历史舞台。

Mercury thermometers have long been popular in the market due to their accurate measurements and low prices. 水银体温计因测量精准、价格低廉，长期以来在市场上颇受欢迎。

However, mercury, as a toxic volatile heavy metal, can cause serious harm to human health and the environment if it leaks. 然而，汞作为有毒可挥发重金属，一旦泄漏会对人体健康和环境造成严重危害。

According to an article published by the Suzhou Municipal People's Government, research shows that after a mercury thermometer breaks, indoor mercury concentration can increase nearly a hundredfold in a short period, and even with ventilation, it takes a month to recover. 据苏州市人民政府发布的一篇文章，研究显示，一支水银体温计摔碎后，室内汞浓度可在短时间内升高近百倍，即使通风也需一个月才能恢复。

In fact, as early as 2017, the Minamata Convention on Mercury came into effect in China, explicitly requiring the prohibition of the production of mercury-containing thermometers and sphygmomanometers starting from 2026. 事实上，早在 2017 年，《关于汞的水俣公约》已在我国生效，明确要求自 2026 年起禁止生产含汞体温计和血压计。

The relevant notice issued by the National Medical Products Administration in 2020 further implemented this requirement, stipulating that the validity period of registration certificates for related products shall not exceed December 31, 2025. 国家药监局在 2020 年发布的相关通知进一步落实了这一要求，规定相关产品的注册证有效期不得超过 2025 年 12 月 31 日。

Industry experts point out that with the implementation of the production ban policy, electronic thermometers, infrared forehead thermometers, ear thermometers, and other products will gradually replace mercury thermometers, while electronic sphygmomanometers will become the main alternative to mercury-containing sphygmomanometers. 业内专家指出，随着禁产政策落地，电子体温计、红外额温枪、耳温枪等产品将逐步替代水银体温计，而电子血压计也将成为含汞血压计的主要替代方案。

These new devices offer advantages in measurement accuracy, ease of use, and safety, aligning with the future development trends of medical devices. 这些新型设备在测量精度、使用便利性和安全性方面均具备优势，符合未来医疗器械的发展趋势。

item.title: 成龙跨年新片《过家家》发布特别预告
item.guid: 成龙跨年新片《过家家》发布特别预告
item.description:
The New Year's family film 'Play House,' starring Jackie Chan, released a special trailer and character posters yesterday. The film is scheduled for nationwide release on January 1, 2026. 成龙主演的跨年合家欢影片《过家家》昨日发布特别预告及角色海报，影片已定档 2026 年 1 月 1 日全国上映。

The trailer shows his solitary daily life: solo medical check-ups, eating alone, suffering from insomnia alone, as if interpreting 'I'm always practicing being alone.' However, as a group of strangers unexpectedly enters his life, this lonely old man gradually gets drawn into a 'play house' story full of laughter and tears. 预告片展示了他孤独的日常：独自体检、独自吃饭、独自失眠，仿佛在诠释「我总是一个人在练习一个人」。然而，随着一群陌生人意外闯入他的生活，这个孤单的老人逐渐被卷入一个充满笑与泪的「过家家」故事。

item.title: 韩延新片《空枪》阵容官宣
item.guid: 韩延新片《空枪》阵容官宣
item.description:
The film 'Empty Gun' officially announced part of its cast yesterday. Director Han Yan has teamed up with several powerful creative teams, striving to create a crime drama that combines quality and depth. 电影《空枪》昨日正式官宣部分阵容，导演韩延携手多家实力主创团队，力求打造一部兼具品质与深度的犯罪剧情片。

In the newly released cast poster, gilded bricks are stacked layer upon layer, symbolizing the allure of ultimate wealth and desire, hinting that the core of the story revolves around the complex game of a 'city of desire'. 在最新发布的阵容海报中，鎏金砖块层层堆叠，象征极致财富与欲望的诱惑，暗示故事核心围绕「欲望之城」的复杂博弈。

item.title: 《星际变种》定档 12 月 31 日
item.guid: 《星际变种》定档-12-月-31-日
item.description:
Yesterday, the horror-thriller film 'Interstellar Mutation' officially announced its release date for New Year's Eve, December 31. The film centers on ancient evil spirits, combining monster settings with a suspenseful plot, aiming to create the only domestic horror-thriller blockbuster for the New Year's Eve slot. 昨天，恐怖惊悚电影《星际变种》正式官宣定档 12 月 31 日跨年上映。影片以远古恶灵为核心元素，结合怪物设定与悬疑剧情，力图打造跨年档唯一的国产恐怖惊悚大片。

The film's story revolves around the protagonist, Jeremy, who is haunted by an ancient evil spirit from beginning to end, witnessing the tragic deaths of those around him. After teaming up with female doctor Luna to investigate, he gradually uncovers secret research related to his mother's death in childhood. 影片故事围绕主角雷杰米展开，他自始至终被远古恶灵纠缠，接连目睹身边人惨死。与女医生卢娜联手调查后，逐步揭开与童年母亲死亡相关的秘密研究。
